name: tdavss_InputNorm_BahdanauAttention_ConcatOutA_newImpl
notes: Batch = 6, InputNorm, ConcatOutA, BahdanauAttention, new impl, Remove LSTM Layers in Lip Embidder, 25K training folders, random seed 35, freeze LipNet, Predict time samples directly, 2 Second clips. 0.5 lr decay if no Val_loss Dec for 3 epochs.
